item.title: The spectral diameter of a symplectic ellipsoid
item.description: arXiv:2408.07214v1 Announce Type: new Abstract: The spectral diameter of a symplectic ball is shown to be equal to its capacity; this result upgrades the known bound by a factor of two and yields a simple formula for the spectral diameter of a symplectic ellipsoid. We also study the relationship between the spectral diameter and packings by two balls.
item.dc:creator: Habib Alizadeh, Marcelo S. Atallah, Dylan Cant
